title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When code assist is triggered, the file becomes dirtied despite no changes made. Additionally, the code assist does not appear.
OB: The file is marked as dirtied even though no changes are made, and the code assist does not appear.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirtied. The code assist should also be displayed as expected.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the file in the editor. 
2. Trigger the code assist feature. 
3. Observe that the file becomes dirtied and the code assist does not appear.
